title: WeDo: Technical Implementation & Training Reference
description: Consolidated technical context for Valkey/Redis integration, Agent metabolic heartbeats, and SFT/Behavioral Cloning standards.

values.name: JSON Memory Access (Valkey)
values.rule: Use json_get with path arguments to retrieve specific keys from the connection manager.
values.rationale: Enables low-latency retrieval of specific state branches without loading the entire document.

values.name: Metabolic Heartbeat
values.rule: Agents must maintain an async heartbeat thread (heart_rate: 11) to report concurrency and task indices.
values.rationale: Ensures the swarm orchestrator can monitor agent health and prevents orphan processes.

values.name: Training Standards (SFT)
values.rule: Use [Title] and [Section] headers for all SFT Guides and Behavioral Cloning documentation.
values.rationale: Legacy structured format required for specific model fine-tuning and training log parsing.

values.name: Wikipedia/Wayback Search
values.rule: Use dedicated search classes for Internet Archive and Wikipedia.
